text:
Could you elaborate...
on what you mean by "doesn't resonate"?

Well...
I've never really felt sad about parting ways...

I didn't feel sad when I graduated from middle school
either, so maybe I'm just insensitive to these things.

Oh, I definitely think the lyrics are lovely, you know?
Singing with Mano and Meguru feels really good.

Of course. But insensitive, huh...
I want to ask you something, though, Hiori.

For instance, about this separation...
How would you feel if it were Mano or Meguru on the other side?
If you didn't know when you could meet again

I think I understand the sentiment behind that SNS post now.
Just thinking about it makes me... No, it's really unpleasant.
